page.title: 05MONDAY 3RD OF JUNE 1985
page.content: I leave home at 8.30am and cycle to school.When I arrive I put my bike in the shed and get out my reading book and my spelling things.Its my job to blow the whistle so everyone comes in.Mrs Curtis our secretary then comes in and finds out whos having school dinners.We read our reading booksand then we learn our spellings,after we've finished them we have an assembly where the whole school meets sing a hymn and listen to a story.When we come back we do maths.at 10.40am wego out to play.at 11.00am we come in and do our language work until 12.00am then we go to lunch.about 24 children have school meals,4 go home and 52 bring sandwiches.at 1.15pn we come in and read then we do our project work wich the Domesday project.3.00pm we pack up and have a story until 3.30pm then we go home.
